mapper.insert: insert into askReview(ar_no,a_no,um_no,bm_no,ar_content,ar_status) values((select nvl(max(ar_no),0)+1 from askReview), #{a_no}, #{um_no}, #{bm_no}, #{ar_content}, #{ar_status})
mapper.select: select * from askReview where a_no = #{a_no} order by ar_no desc
mapper.update: update askReview set ar_content = #{ar_content}, ar_status = #{ar_status} where ar_no = #{ar_no}
